title: 2020 Innovation‐Based Optimism for Lung Cancer Outcomes
abstract: 2020 Erin L. Schenk Tejas Patil Jose Pacheco Paul A. Bunn Implications for Practice Lung cancer survival rates have improved because of new prevention, screening, and therapy methods. This work provides a review of current standards for each of these areas, including targeted and immunotherapies. Treatment recommendations are provided for all stages of lung cancer.
description:
Implications for Practice
          Lung cancer survival rates have improved because of new prevention, screening, and therapy methods. This work provides a review of current standards for each of these areas, including targeted and immunotherapies. Treatment recommendations are provided for all stages of lung cancer.
